entities.name: SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: Target Company in Project Systran Dataroom. Operates an information and communication system.

entities.name: Système d'information et de communication
entities.description: The company's information and communication system, to which the charter applies.

entities.name: Ordinateurs
entities.description: Fixed or portable computers, part of the information system.

entities.name: Périphériques
entities.description: Peripherals, part of the information system.

entities.name: Réseau informatique
entities.description: Computer network including servers, routers, and connectivity, part of the information system.

entities.name: Photocopieurs
entities.description: Photocopiers, part of the information system.

entities.name: Téléphones
entities.description: Telephones, part of the information system.

entities.name: Logiciels
entities.description: Software, part of the information system.

entities.name: Services en ligne
entities.description: Online services, part of the information system.

entities.name: Fichiers
entities.description: Files, part of the information system.

entities.name: Données
entities.description: Data, part of the information system.

entities.name: Bases de données
entities.description: Databases, part of the information system.

entities.name: Système de messagerie
entities.description: Messaging system, part of the information system.

entities.name: Intranet
entities.description: Intranet, part of the information system.

entities.name: Extranet
entities.description: Extranet, part of the information system.

entities.name: Abonnements à des services interactifs
entities.description: Subscriptions to interactive services, part of the information system.

entities.name: Matériel personnel des salariés
entities.description: Employees' personal equipment connected to the company network or containing professional information, considered part of the information system for security reasons.

entities.name: SYSTRAN - Guest Network Access
entities.description: Guest network access provided by SYSTRAN, exclusively for internet browsing.
All users of SYSTRAN's information and communication system.
Administrators of the information system, a type of user.
Employees of SYSTRAN, a type of user.
Executive managers of SYSTRAN, a type of user.
Temporary staff working for SYSTRAN, a type of user.
Interns working for SYSTRAN, a type of user.
Employees of service provider companies working for SYSTRAN, a type of user.
Occasional visitors to SYSTRAN's premises, a type of user.
External persons visiting SYSTRAN's site, who may use the guest network.
SYSTRAN employees who receive visitors and are responsible for requesting guest network access.
Department responsible for IT services and support, and for providing guest network access.
Role responsible for providing guest network access.
Role responsible for providing guest network access.
Responsible for the proper functioning, availability, maintenance, security, and evolution of SYSTRAN's information system, and for providing services and support to users.
